page.title: 20FARMING 2
page.content: Animal rearing is also important. The main animals kept are pigs and beef cattle. All farms keep poultry. Main markets for the animals are the auction markets at Darlington, Stockton and Thirsk. All of the farms use a large amount of machinery. Each farmer owns at least three tractors and one combine harvester. Although there is all of this machinery the field sizes are still small, with hedgerows forming the boundaries. Work on the farms is done mainly by the farmers and their families, with very few full time employees. Part time workers are mainly taken on in September, for the potato picking season and harvest time.
